page.title: 16Brownies and Canoeing.
page.content:
A girl and boy, both aged 10, say what they do out of school.
Every Wednesday night, at 6 o'clock I go to the 4th. Thurmaston{Brownies.} We learn to do things to help people. We should think of others before ourselves and do a good turn every day. We play lots of games like "Man the Lifeboat" and "Supermarket". We sometimes have a quiz. At the end we sing and have prayers. At half past seven we go home. My{canoe}is red with white stripes round it and is called a dancer. Each week I have lessons with ten others. I have learned capsize drill, stern- and bow-rudder,sweep and draw strokes. After five lessons we had a test and I passed so now I can now go casual conoeing.
